trackingPopup.title: Usage statistics
trackingPopup.desc: To be able to improve our services we'd like to anonymously record the individual pages you're visiting.

droperror.invalidtype: Type of chosen file is not accepted

imageuploader.pleasedroporclick: Drag & drop an image here, or click to select one
imageuploader.error: Unfortunately, we could not finish you upload please try again later

form.unsavedchanges: It looks like you've unsaved changes. Leave without saving?

filter.andRelationship: Locations must match all the given terms

select.searchForLocations: Please search and select your locations

embed.noLocationSelected: Please select some locations via the search form above

mixed.oneOf: This field must be one of the following values: {{values}}
mixed.notOneOf: This field must not be one of the following values: {{values}}
mixed.notType: This field must not be of the type: {{type}}

string.length: This field must be exactly {{length}} characters long
string.min: This field must be at least {{min}} characters long
string.max: This field must be at most {{max}} characters long
string.matches: This field must match the following: "{{regex}}"
string.email: This field must be a valid email address
string.url: This field must be a valid URL
string.uuid: This field must be a valid UUID
string.trim: This field must be a trimmed string
string.lowercase: This field must be written in lower case only
string.uppercase: This field must be written in upper case only

number.min: This field must be greater than or equal to {{min}}
number.max: This field must be less than or equal to {{max}}
number.lessThan: This field must be less than {{less}}
number.moreThan: This field must be greater than {{more}}
number.positive: This field must be a positive number
number.negative: This field must be a negative number
number.integer: This field must be an integer

date.min: This field must be later than {{min}}
date.max: This field must be at earlier than {{max}}

object.noUnknown: This field field has unspecified keys: {{unknown}}

array.max: You can only select less than or equal to {{max}} items

imageConfirmation.required: Please confirm that the image can be published on our website

tAndC.required: Please confirm our terms and conditions

suggestion.writeError: We could unfortunately not save your suggestion at the moment. Please try again later.
suggestion.successfullySubmitted: Thank you! Your suggestion has been successfully submitted
suggestion.successfullySubmittedReviewInfor: We will review it manually and put your suggestion online as fast as possible

about.title: About the location
about.description: Please tell us something about the suggested location.

address.title: Address
address.description: Please enter the address of the location. We will use this information to place the location on the map

contact.title: Contact information
contact.description: How can people contact the location? This information will be listed on our website.

image.title: Image
image.description: Do you have an image of the location and are you the bearer of the rights? Then upload your image here.

online.title: Website(s)
online.description: Can the location be found online?

taxonomies.title: The location is ...
taxonomies.description: Please indicate the attributes under which the location should be found in the search.

suggestor.title: About yourself
suggestor.description: In case we have further questions please give us your name and email address. We will keep this information private.

label.title: Name of location
label.suggestionSubmittersImageRightsConfirmat: I confirm that I bear the image rights and that the image can be freely used on the website
label.suggestionSubmittersTandCAcceptance: I agree to data processing of my information in accordance with the DSVGO/GDPR.
label.ownerOfLocation: I confirm that the information I have given is correct.

placeholder.title: Please enter the name of the suggested location
placeholder.otherLanguageDescriptionInGerman: Please describe the location in German too, if possible
placeholder.otherLanguageDescriptionInEnglish: Please describe the location in English
placeholder.comments: Do you have any other notes or comments?

error.dataLoad: Oops, something went wrong and we could not load the required data. Please try again later!
error.internalServerError: Oops, an error happened on our server

translation.comingSoon: Please bear with us. We are working on the English translation.
